What is this site about?

There are no geographical, linguistic and racial barriers for love. The language of love is universal... But sometimes the lovers don’t speak the same language and it becomes an obstacle for building any relationships. Our site differs from the other online dating sites because we offer the services of professional translators who help the lovers to understand each other without any problems. Meet here, talk and be happy together!
